message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which holds immense value to us. Considering its significance and the benefits it provides, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am extending an exclusive offer to you for this product at a special price of $12000. This price reflects the value I place on your interest and the opportunity to bring such a valuable asset into your possession. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget, so we can proceed with the transaction.
